Posting a note¶

This is how to post a note on Pump.io:

>>> from PyPump.objects.note import Note
>>> pump = PyPump("Tsyesika@pump.megworld.co.uk", key=..., secret=..., token=..., token_secret=...)
>>> note = Note("Hey! This was posted by PyPump ^_^")
